labelText: Your One-Stop Hub for Events & Gatherings Nearby
descriptionText: Discover events happening around you or create your own with ease. Whether you're planning something for friends and family or connecting with people who share your interests, BLU makes it simple. Even on a random Tuesday, you can find—or start—something fun, all from your pocket.

Our curated feed blends posts, rooms, clips, and videos to showcase real moments and interests. Share your experiences and connect through one-on-one chats, group messaging, or event rooms—making BLU the first social event platform to unify media, messaging, and gatherings in one place.

labelText: Schedule, Get Reminders & Map Your Way to a Link Up
descriptionText: BLU makes showing up easier than ever. Schedule events, receive timely reminders, and map the best routes—all in one place. Our interactive calendar lets you share your availability and see when friends are free, making it easier to plan and commit. No more excuses or missed moments—just a smoother way to connect.
